selectFile(byte[]) - Method in class be.belgium.eid.eidlib.SmartCard
Selects a file on the smart card so that it can be read from or written to.
setStatus(CertificateStatus) - Method in class be.belgium.eid.security.Certificate
Sets the status of the certificate.
setUp() - Method in class be.belgium.eid.tests.FormattedTLVTest
 
SignatureCertificate - Class in be.belgium.eid.security
This class contains the signature certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
SignatureCertificate(SmartCard) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.SignatureCertificate
Initializes the signature certificate by reading it from the given card reader.
SignatureCertificate(byte[]) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.SignatureCertificate
Initializes the signature certificate by the given data.
SignatureVerificationException - Exception in be.belgium.eid.exceptions
The "signature verification" exception is thrown when certain data couldn't be verified against it's signature using a public key or that the verification turned out to be unsuccessful because of a mismatch between the data and signature.
SignatureVerificationException(String) - Constructor for exception be.belgium.eid.exceptions.SignatureVerificationException
Initializes the signature verification exception with the given object whose raw data couldn't be verified correctly.
SignatureVerificationException(Throwable, String) - Constructor for exception be.belgium.eid.exceptions.SignatureVerificationException
Initializes the signature verification exception with the given object and the given cause of the problem whose raw data couldn't be verified correctly.
SmartCard - Class in be.belgium.eid.eidlib
The SmartCard class contains the different operations that can be performed on a regular (not specifically e-ID related) smart card.
SmartCard() - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.eidlib.SmartCard
Sets up the system.
SmartCardReadable - Interface in be.belgium.eid.objects
This interface can be used by the implementing class to define an object that can be read from a smart card.
stopThread() - Method in class be.belgium.eid.event.CardAlivePromptTask
Indicates that the thread needs to stop running.
stringData(byte) - Method in class be.belgium.eid.eidcommon.FormattedTLV
Returns the data associated with the given tag in a string on which all kinds of string operations can be performed.
